pf2e-xp.show-encounter-xp.name: Show Encounter Threat Level
pf2e-xp.show-encounter-xp.hint: When creating a combat encounter, display the threat level and XP budget for that encounter.
pf2e-xp.show-encounter-xp-hud.name: Show XP on Token HUD.
pf2e-xp.show-encounter-xp-hud.hint: When creating a combat encounter, the XP a creature will add to the budget will be displayed on the token's HUD..
